name: Deathcoil Spring
description: A deadly, coiled metal spring under immense tension. A single misstep could unleash a devastating blast of kinetic force, sending foes into oblivion. Its volatile energy makes it both unpredictable and lethal in the wrong hands.

actions.name: Bounceback Bash
actions.description: Grip the coiled spring, unleash a brutal swing and club your target.
lines: This is why we torque to spec!
